summary: A preset for a pretty male Nord.
descriptionHtml:
Ivaan is a Male Nord character I created for myself, and I thought his face was pretty, so I thought I'd share a Preset of it. This is my first contribution to the Nexus, and also my first time using the CK. Making a preset seemed like an easy place to start. I'd like to eventually make him into a standalone follower, once I figure it all out. Any tips, pointers, suggestions, from experienced modders are greatly appreciated.

If you think he's pretty and use him, please give him your endorsement. I only used Vanilla assets*, so there theoretically should be no conflicts, except perhaps with those that alter the Nord Race. Although this is unlikely. Be sure you make a hard save before installing, so you can go back if something goes wrong. As with any mod, you use at your own risk.

*Note: Preset was created with Vanilla assets, however, screenshots were taken on my personal game and I use Better Males with one of the Younger Faces options, so he may not look quite as pretty. I highly recommend using Better Males if you want the same results. 

Better Males- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?
author: MadIvri
